t = input()
for i in range(t):
    a= int(raw_input())
    b =[ int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    for e in range(0,a-1,2):
        if( b[e]>b[e+1]):
            c = b[e]
            b[e] = b[e+1]
            b[e+1] = c
    for e in range(1,a-1,2):
        if( b[e]<b[e+1]):
            c = b[e]
            b[e] = b[e+1]
            b[e+1] = c
    for i in b:
        print i,
